verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H3401>Strive<s%> <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, with them that <S%H3401>strive<s%> with <S%H3898>me<s%>: Fight thou against them that fight against <S%H3898>me<s%>.
Take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6793>buckler<s%>, And stand <S%H6965>up<s%> for my <S%H5833>help<s%>.

Draw <S%H7324>out<s%> also the <S%H2595>spear<s%>, and <S%H5462>stop<s%> the way <S%H7125>against<s%> them that <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H559>me<s%>: Say unto my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, I am thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

Let them be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> and brought to <S%H3637>dishonor<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: Let them be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> that <S%H2803>devise<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
Let them be as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> driving them <S%H1760>on<s%>.
Let their <S%H1870>way<s%> be <S%H2822>dark<s%> and <S%H2519>slippery<s%>, And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> pursuing <S%H7291>them<s%>.
For without <S%H2600>cause<s%> have they <S%H2934>hid<s%> for me their <S%H7568>net<s%> in a <S%H7845>pit<s%>; Without <S%H2600>cause<s%> have they <S%H2658>digged<s%> a pit for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

Let <S%H7722>destruction<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon him <S%H3045>unawares<s%>; And let his <S%H7568>net<s%> that he hath <S%H2934>hid<s%> <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H7722>himself<s%>: With destruction let him fall <S%H5307>therein<s%>.
And my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: It shall <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

All my <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who is like unto <S%H5337>thee<s%>, Who deliverest the <S%H6041>poor<s%> from him that is too <S%H2389>strong<s%> for <S%H6041>him<s%>, Yea, the poor and the <S%H34>needy<s%> from him that robbeth <S%H1497>him<s%>?
Unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%>; They ask me of <S%H7592>things<s%> that I know <S%H3045>not<s%>.
They <S%H7999>reward<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>, To the <S%H7908>bereaving<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

But as for <S%H2470>me<s%>, when they were sick, my <S%H3830>clothing<s%> was <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>: I <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting<s%>; And my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> into mine own <S%H2436>bosom<s%>.

I <S%H1980>behaved<s%> myself as though it had been my <S%H7453>friend<s%> or my <S%H251>brother<s%>: I bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%>, as one that <S%H57>bewaileth<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>.

But in mine <S%H6761>adversity<s%> they <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%>, and gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%>: The <S%H5222>abjects<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> against <S%H3045>me<s%>, and I knew it <S%H7167>not<s%>; They did tear <S%H1826>me<s%>, and ceased not:
Like the <S%H2611>profane<s%> <S%H3934>mockers<s%> in <S%H4580>feasts<s%>, They <S%H2786>gnashed<s%> upon me with their <S%H8127>teeth<s%>.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, how long wilt thou look <S%H7200>on<s%>? <S%H7725>Rescue<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from their <S%H7722>destructions<s%>, My <S%H3173>darling<s%> from the <S%H3715>lions<s%>.
I will give thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%>: I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> thee among <S%H6099>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Let not them that are mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over <S%H7169>me<s%>; Neither let them wink with the <S%H5869>eye<s%> that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me without a <S%H2600>cause<s%>.
For they <S%H1696>speak<s%> not <S%H7965>peace<s%>; But they <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> against them that are <S%H7282>quiet<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
Yea <S%H6310><s%>, they opened their mouth <S%H7337>wide<s%> against <S%H559>me<s%>; They said, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, <S%H1889>aha<s%>, our <S%H5869>eye<s%> hath seen <S%H7200>it<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>, O Jehovah; Keep not <S%H2790>silence<s%>: O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, be not far from <S%H7368>me<s%>.
Stir <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H6974>thyself<s%>, and awake to the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due unto <S%H7379>me<s%>, Even unto my cause, my <S%H430>God<s%> and my <S%H136>Lord<s%>.
Judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah my <S%H430>God<s%>, according to thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; And let them not rejoice over <S%H8055>me<s%>.
Let them not <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, so would we have <S%H5315>it<s%>: Let them not <S%H559>say<s%>, We have swallowed him <S%H1104>up<s%>.

Let them be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> and <S%H954>confounded<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> at my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>: Let them be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%> and <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> that magnify themselves against <S%H1431>me<s%>.

Let them shout for <S%H7442>joy<s%>, and be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, that <S%H2655>favor<s%> my righteous <S%H6664>cause<s%>: <S%H559>Yea<s%>, let them say <S%H8548>continually<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%>, Who hath <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
And my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H1897>talk<s%> of thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> And of thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.
